name: Free Online PDF to Text Extractor - ATools
description: Extract text from PDF locally in your browser and export as TXT or ZIP (no uploads).
seoDescription: Free online PDF to text extractor by ATools. Import a PDF and extract copyable text content by page or by custom ranges (e.g., 1-3,5,10-). Export as a single TXT file or per-page text files bundled in a ZIP. Runs entirely in your browser with zero uploads for privacy. Note: scanned image-only PDFs may require OCR and may not contain selectable text.
